description:
Two separate conversations reveal the multitude of revelations that Chise and Elias have had about one another, and the ways they`ve both grown and changed. Hazel guides them on a dangerous shortcut back to the College.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Cowl Does Not Make the Monk.
The Cowl Does Not Make the Monk.
The cowl does not make the monk.
